CustomField.description: **System Calculated** Valid for adjustments only. Default is blank, populates with the current date's value when a line is flagged as "Is Adjustment" and "Is Posted".
CustomField.inlineHelpText: **System Calculated** Valid for adjustments only. Default is blank, populates with the current date's value when a line is flagged as "Is Adjustment" and "Is Posted".
CustomField.label: Posted Date (Adjustment)
